detail_desc: Shirt jacket in jersey with a collar, buttons down the front and flap chest pockets with a button. Low dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Unlined.
A-line dress in soft, jacquard-knit jersey made from a cotton blend with long sleeves, fake welt front pockets, a ribbed neckline, and press-studs on one shoulder.
Vest tops in soft cotton jersey, one with a small print on the chest.
High-waisted jersey leggings with concealed elastication at the waist.
Thin metal rings in various designs.
Oversized lace shirt with a pointed collar and buttons down the front. Low dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, two open chest pockets, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back. Unlined.
Espadrilles with a braided jute trim around the soles. Fabric linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Fitted jumper in soft, fine-knit, ribbed cashmere with 3/4-length sleeves and ribbing around the neckline.
Chinos in washed stretch cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly, side pockets, a fake coin pocket, fake back pockets and slim legs.
Soft, non-wired mesh bra that gives the bust a natural shape and light support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes.
Hat in a rib-knit wool blend with a turned-up hem.
T-shirt in soft, printed jersey with press-studs on one shoulder and sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves.
Scarf in a soft rib knit. Size 45x160 cm.
5-pocket shorts in washed, stretch cotton denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button and slim legs that finish just above the knees. The cotton content of the shorts is partly recycled.

Shirt in checked cotton flannel containing glittery threads with a collar, pearly press-studs down the front and a lace yoke at the back and over the shoulders. Chest pockets, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem with short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Wide, ankle-length trousers in a crêpe weave with a high, frill-trimmed, elasticated waist and concealed pockets in the side seams.
Brazilian briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Fine-knit jumper in cotton slub yarn with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fully lined sports bralette in fast-drying functional fabric with a wrapover back. Seamless. Light support.
Straight-cut blouse with a smocked stand-up collar and an opening at the back with buttons at the back of the neck. Long puff sleeves with a frill and smocking at the cuffs.
Ankle-length leggings in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and print motifs.
5-pocket slim-fit trousers in washed stretch twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and narrow hems.
Cotton jersey boxer briefs in various designs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.

Tunic in crisp cotton seersucker with an opening and button at the back of the neck, dropped shoulders and short, voluminous puff sleeves. Seam with a drawstring under the bust and at the back. Lined with a detachable, V-neck inner top in a viscose weave. The inner top has narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Metal clips with hair extensions in various shades that clip easily into your hair. Length of clips 2.8 cm. Length of hair extensions approx. 35 cm.
Derby shoes in imitation suede with open lacing at the front and a decorative welt seam around the soles. Fabric linings and insoles and crêpe soles. Heel 2 cm.
Wide trousers in a patterned, softly draping weave with a high elasticated waist and side pockets.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with pattern-knit stripes, a button placket and long raglan sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a textured cotton-blend knit with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Soft cotton jersey leggings in different designs with an elasticated waist.
Small shoulder bag with a metal buckle at the front, three inner compartments and a narrow metal chain shoulder strap. Lined. Size 4x11x15.5 cm.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a washed look/ Lined hood, raised motif on the front, kangaroo pocket, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Thin metal hoop earrings. Diameter 9.5 cm.
Shorts in cotton poplin with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly and side pockets.
Two-button jacket in a textured weave with notch lapels, a fake pocket at the top, welt front pockets with a flap, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Joggers in soft, double-weave organic cotton with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, open leg pockets and elasticated hems.
Playsuit in a viscose weave with a V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, an elasticated seam at the waist and front pockets.
Double-layered triangular scarves in soft cotton jersey with an adjustable press-stud fastening at the back of the neck.
Jumper in a soft rib knit in a short, slightly wider style with a V-neck, dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Sleeveless dress in soft, organic cotton jersey with a smocked seam at the waist and narrow shoulder straps with a decorative bow.

Airy blouse made from a Tencel™ lyocell and organic silk jacquard weave. Pointed, turn-down grandad collar with ties at the top, and concealed buttons down the front with a frilled button band. Frill around the shoulders, long trumpet sleeves and a rounded hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline and buttons down the front.
Fine-knit, short-sleeved dress in a cotton blend containing glittery threads with a decorative bow at the neck.
Tights in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
High-waisted trousers in woven fabric with a detachable tie belt, pleats and the top and a zip in the side. Zip fly with hook and eye fasteners, side pockets, fake back pockets and wide tapered legs.
Tops in soft cotton jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder and long sleeves.
Jersey trousers with a regular, elasticated waist and straight, wide legs with sewn-in creases.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey with a chest pocket and sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves.
Jumper knitted in a soft cotton blend containing some alpaca wool with pattern-knit sections and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fitted, off-the shoulder top in a fine rib knit with a wide lace trim at the top and long sleeves.
Metal earrings decorated with shells. Length 6.5 cm.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Long sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Soft, non-wired, push-up bras with moulded, padded triangular cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back and no fasteners.
Short dress in velour with a V-neck, sewn in wrapover with pleats at the front and long sleeves. Partly lined.
Long-sleeved sweatshirt in a soft, printed sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with embroidery. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Skirt in soft, organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and two tiers. Sewn-in pants with elastication and decorative gathers at the hems.
Straight-cut shirt in a cotton weave in a relaxed fit with a turn-down collar, classic front, short sleeves and a rounded hem with slits in the sides.
Popover jacket in woven fabric with a drawstring hood and zip at the top. Large front pocket with a concealed zip, and elastication at the cuffs. Mesh lining.

Set with a short-sleeved football top and football shorts in fast-drying functional fabric. Top with a print motif front and back. Shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and print motifs on the legs.

Set with a top and shorts. Top in a soft Tencel™ lyocell weave with decorative pompoms on the front, short raglan sleeves and elastication around the neckline. Shorts in dobby-weave cotton with elastication at the waist and hems.
Pyjama bottoms in sturdy jersey with an elasticated, drawstring waist and wide, straight legs.
Short, off-the-shoulder top in a soft rib knit with long sleeves and wide decorative straps that wrap over at the front.

Oversized shirt in airy, rustly nylon with a wide, pointed collar, concealed button band, dropped shoulders and elbow-length sleeves. Two flap chest pockets and two front pockets, one with a split flap and a pleat. Seam at the waist and a curved hem. Longer at the back.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with buttons down the front, ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem and a straight hem with short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Sleeveless dress in a patterned cotton weave with a wrapover fastening and small opening at the back, and an elasticated seam at the waist. Lined at the top. Matching hairband with a sewn-on bow at the front and covered elastication at the back.
Long, sleeveless dress in a viscose weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a V-neck with a sewn-in wrapover, and a seam at the waist with ties at one side. Unlined.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Cardigan knitted in a soft wool blend with long, wide puff sleeves and covered buttons down the front. Ribbed trim around the neckline, down the button band and at the cuffs and hem.

Lightweight, 3/4-length track pants in fast-drying functional fabric with a regular waist, wide waist panel, side pockets and tapered legs with cuffed hems. The polyester content of the track pants is recycled.

Backpack in woven fabric with a handle and adjustable, padded shoulder straps. Zip at the top, a zipped outer compartment and a mesh compartment at one side. Padded laptop sleeve, a zipped inner compartment and a padded back plate and base. Lined. Size 12x28x44 cm.
Sleeveless dress in a patterned cotton weave with a frill-trimmed seam at the top, buttons at the back and flared skirt. Unlined.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Skirt woven in an airy, textured, zebra-striped cotton blend. Sewn-in wrapover with a tie detail and draping at the front. Fitted at the top with volume at the bottom and an asymmetric hem. Unlined.
Lightweight running cap in breathable functional fabric with ventilating mesh sections and an adjustable hook and loop tab at the back. Reflective details.
Tights in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Briefs in soft, organic cotton jersey with a wide, foldover edge at the waist and soft, narrow elastic trims at round the legs.
Twill cap with an appliqué on the front and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Short, fitted dress in stretch velvet with a V-neck front and back, narrow shoulder straps and a visible zip at the front.
Fitted top in soft organic cotton jersey with 3/4-length sleeves and gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Cropped top in jersey with sequins on the front in a narrow cut at the top with narrow shoulder straps.
Shorts in soft, washed denim with an elasticated drawstring waist and a back pocket.
